data.comment: Lawrence Visser starts the match. Mechelen with the kick-off in Ghent.
Goal! Gent have got their heads in front thanks to a Anderson Niangbo strike.
In the minute 45, Lawrence Visser blows to end the first-half.
Gent kick-off the second-half u- the match is underway again!
At Ghelamco Arena, Giorgi Chakvetadze has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 59, Rob Schoofs (Mechelen) has received a yellow card from Lawrence Visser.
Wouter Vrancken is making the team's first substitution at Ghelamco Arena with Igor De Camargo replacing William Togui.
Wouter Vrancken (Mechelen) is making a second substitution, with Maryan Shved replacing Joachim Van Damme.
In the minute 73, Roman Bezus is on a sub for Giorgi Chakvetadze for Gent.
The home team replace Roman Yaremchuk with Jordan Botaka.
Mechelen make their third substitution with Onur Kaya replacing Lucas Bijker.
In the minute 87, Niklas Dorsch is replacing Anderson Niangbo for the home team.
